title: All These Things: Something of a Memoir
description: Life as the most available loser is something Sam Reed is no stranger to. As he tries to come to terms with himself and the world around him, he faces tough decisions about life, religion, depression, and constant struggles with his ADHD and his sexuality. Can Sam pull himself out of the rain and see the best life has to offer? Or will he fall victim to the pressures that surround him and his friends? Haunting, sexy, and mesmerizingly written, "All These Things" is sure to captivate you.10% of the publisherâ€™s proceeds from All These Things is donated to the It Gets Better Project!
author: Tyler Reedus
